entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. High 18. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Becoming clear overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 20. POP 30%
